TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeObjectCreateExpression extends System.CodeDom.CodeExpression

Docs.summary: Represents an expression that creates a new instance of a type.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression> can be used to represent an expression that creates an instance of a type.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression.CreateType%2A> property specifies the data type to create a new instance of. The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression.Parameters%2A> property specifies the parameters to pass to the constructor of the type to create a new instance of.
## Examples The following example demonstrates use of <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeObjectCreateExpression> to create a new instance of the System.DateTime class using the default constructor.
[!code-cpp[CodeMultiExample#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeMultiExample/CPP/codemultiexample.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[CodeMultiExample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeMultiExample/CS/codemultiexample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[CodeMultiExample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CodeMultiExample/VB/codemultiexample.vb#5)]
